title: ESR version of firefox does not allow multi containers add-on
content: I went to the official add-on site and I did not see the Add-on named "multi containers" made by Firefox themselves, yet there were about 6 pages of add-on's similar named 'container' but not the one I wanted which is called 'multi containers' add-on.
creator: pocket123vpn

title: Lost Favorite Bookmarks from the Toolbar
content:
Hi Firefox Community support,

I am not sure what happened but I updated my firefox browser tonight and all my favorite bookmark toolbar disappeared. Is there any easier way to bring them back to show in the browser page's top as before. They are sitting in the folders but now showing up anymore. Tried dragging them but them won't budge. Closed out browser, restarted macbook - nothing worked. It's already wasted so much time in researching and troubleshooting without a fully applicable instruction anywhere for a mac user trying to resolve this issue.

Also, tried to upload image in word or pdf, but it doesn't work with the format here perhaps. Not sure what else can I easily and quickly try.

Please help, thx!
creator: bjazzmk

title: error: The version of this file is not compatibel with the version of Win you're running.."
content:
hi..please see attached image..I'm wondering if I did something to cause this. I think I clicked on the update FFN notification that regularly appears in the upper right-hand corner or my laptop screen. I then restarted the computer. then this error. I did the FF "refresh" and that seems (so far) to have fixed the problem, but it wiped my settings :( any suggestions or thoughts appreciate..thx Matt
